resources.string:
Thank you for using our WhatsApp Status Download App. This Privacy Policy is intended to explain how we collect, use, and disclose your information when you use our app.

1) Information We Collect:

We do not collect any personal information from you when you use our app. However, in order to provide the service of downloading WhatsApp status videos, we do require access to your phone storage.


2) How We Use Your Information:

We only access your phone storage in order to download WhatsApp status videos to your gallery. We do not use or share any of the files we access for any other purpose.


3) Information Sharing and Disclosure:

We do not share or disclose any of the files we access on your phone storage. All files are downloaded directly to your device and stored in your gallery.


4) Your Choices:

You have the right to control access to your phone storage. You can choose to grant or revoke access to your phone storage at any time through your device settings.


5) Data Security:

We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, since we do not collect or store any personal information, there is no risk of data breaches or loss of personal information.


6) Changes to this Privacy Policy:

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes
